mutants.code:
def count_common_characters(str1, str2):
    str1_set = set(str1)
    str2_set = set(str2)
    common_chars_set = str1_set | str2_set
    common_chars_count = sum((min(str1.count(char), str2.count(char)) for char in common_chars_set))
    return common_chars_count
